page.title: 06ONE DAY IN MY LIFE_1
page.content: My Mum wakes me up at seven o'clock. I do not like getting up early. We go down for breakfast before we get into our School clothes.I have cereal in the morning but if we are having packed lunch we have an egg as well. I wash before I get into my school clothes. My brother and I sometimes make the packed lunch.Then I say good bye to my Mum and baby sister.I sometimes go to School at nine o'clock.I play with one of my best friends while I wait for the bell to ring. First I do my maths which I find quite hard.So I am glad when playtime comes and I am ready to eat the snack Mum gave me. After playtime I do my English which can be S.R.A. or workbook work cards or Personal writing spelling or I do Nature work.
